content:
path /v3/tatum/rate/currency
operationId getExchangeRate
parameters
description The fiat or crypto asset to exchange
in path
name currency
required True
schema
FiatOrCryptoCurrency
type string
description The target fiat asset to get the exchange rate for
in query
name basePair
schema
FiatCurrency
type string
default EUR
summary Get the current exchange rate for exchanging fiat/crypto assets
description 1 credit per API call
Get the current exchange rate for exchanging fiat/crypto assets
By default the base pair the target asset is EUR When obtaining the exchange rate for an asset for example BTC the value returned by the API expresses the amount of EUR that can be currently exchanged into 1 BTC
responses
200
ExchangeRate
description FIAT value in EURO of the FIAT or crypto asset
properties
id
description FIAT or crypto asset
type string
value
description FIAT value of the asset in given base pair
type string
basePair
description Base pair
default EUR
type string
timestamp
description Date of validity of rate in UTC
type number
source
description Source of base pair
type string
batchId
description Used for identification in batch calls
type string
type object
required
id
value
basePair
timestamp
source
description OK
